title: Traditional lebkuchen
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar', '2 eggs', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '50g chopped candied citron', '50g chopped almonds', 'white or lemon icing']
